Oakley Signs is a website where you can purchase real estate signs and yard signs for your business.

Is Oakley Signs a scam?

Oakley Signs isn't a scam but you should remain vigilant when choosing different websites to shop from. If a company makes excessive claims that are too good to be true, more han likely it's fraudulent. Or if a company tries to pressure you into accepting their products or services by claiming that this is your last opportunity, a red flag should go up immediately. Sometimes fraudulent companies will include testimonials in their ads to lure you in but this is not proof that a company is legitimate. One good way to determine if a company isn't a scam is to talk with some friends and relatives who used the company's services or products and ask if they were satisfied with them. You can visit the Better Business Bureau's website and type in the name of the company so you can read customer reviews and find out if there are any complaints that were filed against that company for unethical practices. Another way to determine if a company is legitimate is to see if their website has both an "About Us" or "Contact Us" sections because this usually means it's a legitimate company. If you feel you've been scammed by a company you can file a complaint with the Better Business Bureau or Federal Trade Commission. Sometimes fraudulent companies disguise themselves as the real thing by using logos that are similar to real companies that you're familiar with. Finally, you can send an e-mail and request some information on the company.

What does Oakley Signs do?

Oakley Signs offers real estate signs to realtors who use them to announce the sale of a house, rental vacancy or a real estate open house event. Oakley Signs are affordable and they not only sell real estate signs but also political signs, garage sale signs, vehicle signs and banners. Oakley Signs is a good place to purchase various signs for different purposes, and you can these signs for all kinds of events. For example, if you're holding a book fair, you can use Oakley Signs to help promote the event. Oakley Signs also sells accessories and hardware which can help you put your sign up, and you can even find flyers which you can customize and use these in addition to your signs. Oakley Signs has plenty of bargains on these signs, and you can sign up for the e-mail newsletter and get discounts on a weekly basis. These signs are easy to build and use, and they're portable. Oakley Signs has a friendly customer service staff and they can answer all questions about the items you're interested in. It also helps to read the product descriptions on the website so you'll have a better idea of what kinds of signs are available and which ones suit your needs. Oakley Signs has been around since 1972, and this company has a long tradition of selling high quality signs for realtors and for political purposes. Oakley Signs is a good place to purchase high quality signs for customers.
